question:
The plan, according to law enforcement and judicial officials, was to keep the prisoner ________ during his court appearances, but the defense attorney argued that restraints would prejudice the jury.
Two Answers
A. manacled
B. malleable
C. nettled
D. fettered
E. incensed
F. incomparable
